price: وېلې: آيا  ته مو له ځان سره وړوكى ونه روزلې او د خپل عمر ډېر كلونه دې راسره تېر (نه) كړل.
arabic: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدٗا وَلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam nurabbika fīnā walīdan walabith'ta fīnā min ʿumurika sinīna
